constraints.name: adjacent_difference
constraints.description: 相邻节点取值不同（图着色约束）
constraints.formal: 对于任意 i, j (1 ≤ i < j ≤ 2n)，若 |i - j| = 1，则 color(i) ≠ color(j)

constraints.name: modular_arithmetic
constraints.description: 结果需要对给定的模数 p 取余
constraints.formal: result ≡ (sum of all valid colorings * (2 * i)^m) % p
